entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 28 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 28 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
